title: Research judicial.alabama.gov court website
description:
Research the Alabama Unified Judicial System website and generate a site report.

**URL**: https://judicial.alabama.gov

**Court IDs served by this domain**:
- `ala` - Supreme Court of Alabama
- `alacivapp` - Alabama Court of Civil Appeals  
- `alacrimapp` - Alabama Court of Criminal Appeals

**Instructions**: Follow the workflow in `docs/data/AGENTS.md`

**Output**: Create report at `docs/data/site_reports/judicial.alabama.gov.toml` using the schema from `docs/data/site_reports/_TEMPLATE.toml`
notes: Reopening to verify findings with Playwright browser automation and capture JSON API endpoints
